etymology.description: Depicts a flag on a pole with a decoration on top -> today stylized as 方(方) (fāng, "square")
etymology.interpretation: The character 㫃 depicts a flag attached to a pole with a decorative element on top. Over time, this visual representation simplified, with the flag being stylized to resemble 方(方) (fāng, "square"). This pictographic origin highlights its evolution from a detailed representation to a more abstract form. The character is related to 倝 yet distinct from other characters like 朝.
